issue.title: Several Maps for a joomla Map component installation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

It must be possible to create several maps for a unique joomla website.

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This could be done with management of Web Map Context and advanced authentification for the Map to the proxy in order to allow client to connect without a joomla session.

This can be closed
